title: Fix beam-text centering and beams performance in sysc-Go
description:
FIXED: Beams performance optimization complete

Optimizations applied to sysc-Go animations/beams.go:
1. Sparse sampling (3x3 spacing) - reduces from 12k+ to ~1.3k characters
2. Reduced beam activation (1-2 groups vs 1-5)
3. Increased activation delay (3 vs 1)
4. Reduced beam speeds (30-80 rows, 20-50 cols)

Total performance gain: ~9x fewer allocations
Beams now renders smoothly at fullscreen.

Committed to sysc-Go master: 268508c
